Message:
...Guess this marks
yet another time I’ve gotten
water dumped on me
by these city people.

When will they get it through
their thick skulls that I don’t
have the power to make fire?

This was just another
day in the life of a person
whose tribe was taken over
by the city.

My new life began the day
my settlement was burned
to the ground.

Those were the words
my mother repeated to me
as flames raged all around us.

Wrapped in her arms,
all I could do was
tremble in fear...

Then, when I came to,
everything and everyone
except me had been
burned to ash.

I’m sure that was when I first
awakened to my power to
shield myself from flames.

Nothing turned out “alright” at all...
If this pathetic power could
only save one person,
I’d rather it were...!

Ugh...! Okay, enough thinking!
It’s about time I got the job
that city official threw
at me over with!

If I remember right,
he wanted me to bring back
a “star” or something from
the People of the Plains...
But, what does “star”
even mean...?
